actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that the aggregated period of an invalid marriage deemed valid under such title and a subsequent valid marriage (including any reasonable intervening period) shall be treated as a sufficient period of marriage for treatment as a surviving divorced spouse.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to add the period of a purported marriage deemed valid under the OASDI program to the period of a subsequent valid marriage in determining whether an individual was married for the ten years required for status as a surviving divorced spouse under the OASDI program.

titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that the aggregated period of an invalid marriage deemed valid under such title and a subsequent valid marriage (including any reasonable intervening period) shall be treated as a sufficient period of marriage for treatment as a surviving divorced spouse.
